argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_coprm | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( -. P || M <-> ( P gcd M ) = 1 ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( -. P || M <-> ( P gcd M ) = 1 ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || ( M x. N ) /\ -. P || M ) <-> ( P || ( M x. N ) /\ ( P gcd M ) = 1 ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_coprmdvds | |- ( ( P e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || ( M x. N ) /\ ( P gcd M ) = 1 ) -> P || N ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || ( M x. N ) /\ ( P gcd M ) = 1 ) -> P || N ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || ( M x. N ) /\ -. P || M ) -> P || N ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_expd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( P || ( M x. N ) -> ( -. P || M -> P || N ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-or | |- ( ( P || M \/ P || N ) <-> ( -. P || M -> P || N ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6ibr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( P || ( M x. N ) -> ( P || M \/ P || N ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ordvdsmul | |- ( ( P e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || M \/ P || N ) -> P || ( M x. N ) ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( P || M \/ P || N ) -> P || ( M x. N ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( P || ( M x. N ) <-> ( P || M \/ P || N ) ) ) |
